Contributors

Studium has benefitted from the contributions of numerous individuals over the years. Contributors submit translations, biographies, and provide editorial and proofreading assistance as well.

The complete list of contributors is below. Click any contributor's name to visit a page with biographical details and a list of all translations from that author.

Caleb Bassett Jacob Behnken Nathaniel Biebert Evan Chartrand John Derme Andrew Ewings Benjamin Foxen Timothy Grundmeier Jacob Haag Philip Hunter Andrew Hussman Aaron Jensen Michael Koepke Kirk Lahmann Souksamay Phetsanghane Timothy Rosenow David Strucely Aaron Voss Daniel Waldschmidt Joshua Zarling

Studium is published under the supervision of Martin Luther College, New Ulm, Minnesota.
